query:
UPDATE postgres_trigger 
            SET 
                script_path = $1, 
                path = $2, 
                is_flow = $3, 
                edited_by = $4, 
                email = $5, 
                database_resource_path = $6, 
                replication_slot_name = $7,
                publication_name = $8,
                edited_at = now(), 
                error = NULL,
                server_id = NULL
            WHERE 
                workspace_id = $9 AND 
                path = $10
